content.text:
# Draft:Bariyaar singh alias Barwar

----
Bariyar singh alias Barwar  Born in the 16th century in the Daundiya Khera princely state of Bais dynasty He was the son of King Chhatrasen and the true descendant of King Trilokchand Bais. He was arrested in 1570 while fighting against Akbar  by somehow succeeding in escaping from the shackles  In the year 1585, he attacked the Amsin Pargana of Ayodhya and established the kingdom of 14 Kosh on the hill. This state is named after Bariyar Singh was named Barwar Further, their descendants started being called Barwar Which is still present in Ayodhya, Gonda and nearby areas.
